org.dalesbred

Annotation Type Transactional


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Documented
 @Target(value={METHOD,TYPE})
 @Inherited
public @interface Transactional
    Marks the given method or type as transactional.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      Isolation isolation
      Isolation for transaction
      Propagation propagation
      The propagation for transaction
      int retries
      Number of automatic retries due to serialization failures, default is 0.

    • Element Detail

      • propagation

        @NotNull
public abstract Propagation propagation
        The propagation for transaction
        Default:
        org.dalesbred.Propagation.DEFAULT

      • isolation

        @NotNull
public abstract Isolation isolation
        Isolation for transaction
        Default:
        org.dalesbred.Isolation.DEFAULT

      • retries

        public abstract int retries
        Number of automatic retries due to serialization failures, default is 0.
        Default:
        0
